actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: To amend the Lanham Act to limit the defense against trademark infringement relating to geographic origin.

summary.text: Amends Federal trademark law to limit the defense against trademark infringement relating to geographic origin to a defense on the ground that the allegedly infringing use is of a name, term, or device fairly used only to describe a country of origin.

titles.title: To amend the Lanham Act to limit the defense against trademark infringement relating to geographic origin.
